name: Red Vs Blue (RiverFeb)
description:
A short and simple 3D shooting game. You control a red cube having a gun fight with THREE blue cube.

The game was made in 48 hours for Vertex Jam. Unfortunately the developer was very very sleepy in the end and miss the deadline. A more complicated version is in-process.

Warning: The game is design to be extremely difficult to make you get mad.
